p: Carrageenan was obtained from HiMedia Laboratories Pvt. Ltd., India. Folinâ€“Ciocalteu reagent and ascorbic acid were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, USA. DPPH (2, 2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl) and gallic acid were purchased from Wako Pure Chemical Industries Ltd., Osaka, Japan. All other chemicals used were of analytical grade.
